other_tests.findings: Mucosal thickening of the distal esophagus compatible with esophagitis, similar in appearance to the prior study.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT abdomen and pelvis with contrast
other_tests.findings: Visualized lung fields are within normal limits. There is mucosal thickening of the distal esophagus compatible with esophagitis. Minimal stranding in the left lower quadrant compatible with uncomplicated diverticulosis.
Productive of thick stool without pellets.
